content.B010: Desktop version of <sple/> built using <linkWails>Wails</linkWails>. It uses the same source code as web app <linkSpleMe/> to render frontend, but with some different backend bindings to work with its host binary in desktop environment.
content.B020: compared to DOES work with regular files on your device, like other whatever desktop editors do.

confirm.CloseFileSave: File {filename} has some changes. Save changes?
confirm.CloseOthersSave: There are some changes in files to be closed. Save all closing files?
confirm.ExitSave: There are some changes in files. Save all changed files?
